title: Co-ed Frenzy
description: A serial killer terrorizes university students in their co-ed dormitories.
altHero: a young woman in the shower and the sillouhette of a knife
alt1: a cop peers into a window and a knife is pulled behind him
alt2: looking into a window where young women are dancing
alt3: peering around a corner at two women walking down a hallway
alt4: a steamy bathroom with the reflection of the killer in the mirror
